name: Web of Lies (OshDubh, Dizzydwarf500)
description:
Can your web of lies hold up? A short story-based platformer.

Far From The Ground, Jude Is doing a Job he told everyone he wasn't going to do.

Conflicted with lying to his parents and boss he continues on not knowing what's ahead of him.

Made in 72 hours from scratch by OshDubh and DizzyDwarf.
Sound, art, programming, story - DizzyDwarf.
Art, programming - OshDubh.
